movies.title: Zero Woman: Dangerous Game
movies.plot: In this installment of the Zero Woman series, Rei, the number-one assassin of the Tokyo Police Department's secret Zero Division, has been assigned to take out a notorious gangster responsible for dozens of murders. At the same time, she must protect the gangster's mistress from the hitmen who want to keep her from telling the police what she knows. At first, both women are upset about the arrangement, but they eventually come to appreciate each other.
movies.simplePlot: In this installment of the Zero Woman series, Rei, the number-one assassin of the Tokyo Police Department's secret Zero Division, has been assigned to take out a notorious gangster ...

biography.bio: Chieko Shiratori was born on August 10, 1975 in Yokohama, Japan as Chieko Shirato. She is an actress, known for Zero Woman: Dangerous Game (1998), Eko eko azaraku II (1996) and Metropolitan Police Branch 82 (1998).
biography.name: Chieko Shiratori

biography.bio: Ichiho Matsuda is an actress, known for Zero Woman: Dangerous Game (1998), Family Cinema (1998) and Sasori: Joshuu 701-gô (1998).
biography.name: Ichiho Matsuda

biography.bio: Terunori Miyazaki is an actor, known for Zero Woman: Dangerous Game (1998), Shabondama Elegy (1999) and Karasu (1995).
biography.name: Terunori Miyazaki

biography.bio: Ken Miyawaki is an actor, known for Fruits Ken chan (1976), Osobaya Ken chan (1975) and Ken Niichan (1974).
biography.name: Ken Miyawaki

biography.bio: Daisuke Ryû was born on February 14, 1957 in Tokyo, Japan as Chang Myong-nam. He is an actor, known for Ran (1985), Kagemusha, l'ombre du guerrier (1980) and Après la pluie (1999).
biography.name: Daisuke Ryû

biography.bio: Masayoshi Nogami was born on March 2, 1940 in Shiranuka-gun, Hokkaido Prefecture, Japan. He was an actor and director, known for Kôfun!! (1969), Dorei mibôjin (1967) and Chikan tômei ningen me-me-me: Part 2 (1977). He died on December 22, 2010 in Minato-ku, Tokyo, Japan.
biography.name: Masayoshi Nogami

biography.bio: Shirô Shimomoto was born on August 14, 1948 in Osaka, Japan. He is an actor and director, known for Uncle's Paradise (2006), S&M Hunter (1986) and Rikon-zuma kaikan onanie (1992).
biography.name: Shirô Shimomoto

biography.bio: Keizo Nagashima is an actor, known for Zero Woman: Dangerous Game (1998) and Quartet (2017).
biography.name: Keizo Nagashima

biography.bio: Tadashi Okuno is an actor, known for Like Someone in Love (2012), A Taxing Woman (1987) and Zero Woman: Dangerous Game (1998).
biography.name: Tadashi Okuno

biography.bio: Hajime Tsukumo was born on November 1, 1952 in Osaka, Osaka, Japan as Takashi Fukuchi. He is an actor and writer, known for Keiko Mask (1991), Zero Woman: Dangerous Game (1998) and Face (2000).
biography.name: Hajime Tsukumo

biography.bio: Jonathan Boggs is an actor, known for Ayane's High Kick (1998), Photon (1997) and Zero Woman: Dangerous Game (1998).
biography.name: Jonathan Boggs

biography.bio: Scott Cargle is known for his work on Geobreeders (1998), Photon (1997) and Bob and the Amazon.
biography.name: Scott Cargle

biography.bio: Jeff Gimble is an actor, known for Seiden RG Veda (1992), Losers of the Year (2005) and Agent Aika (1997).
biography.name: Jeff Gimble

biography.placeOfBirth: New York City, New York, USA
biography.bio: Wayne Grayson was born on September 22, 1974 in New York City, New York, USA. He is an actor, known for Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (2003), Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Monsters (2000) and Yu-Gi-Oh! GX (2004). He has been married to Shannon Rhea Thomason since April 2, 2006.
biography.name: Wayne Grayson

biography.bio: Debora Rabbai is an actress, known for Maze (1997), Ayane's High Kick (1998) and Maze bakunetsu jikû OVA (1996).
biography.name: Debora Rabbai
